name: KAIJU KAOS (QUEST DEMO)
description:
For Oculus QUEST 2

In Kaiju Kaos  release your inner monster! Level cities, consume terrified citizens, and be a general menace. 

In this demo experience the power of the Kaiju. Destroy buildings with your bare hands or toss cars about as projectiles. 

The final game will include several varied environments with objectives and interactive NPC's as well as unlockable tools and weapons to expand your destructive abilities. 

This game is still in development and there are bugs. Please feel free to leave a comment regarding your experience.
